title: Circumstances Unraveled
description: On the surface, she’s wild, caring, and has a sassy mouth. Deep down she hides…she’s shy for a big reason.When the past seeks revenge, Mel’s biggest secret is brought roaring to the surface.Jack has never stayed in one place for too long. Never has he gotten attached to anything except his work. Women are just satisfaction to him. He never thought he’d find a woman to spark his lonely heart.When he does, a storm comes rolling in and danger is imminent for the girl he loves.Can he help her survive the thunder that rolls? Will all circumstances be unraveled?
author: Jean Kelso
